product_name: Penngrove Publications Marin Bike County Trails
long_description: Features easy to challenging bicycle rides for touring and mountain bikes in Marin County, California--the heart of bicycling country! Author: Phyllis L. Neumann. Softcover; 128 pages; black-and-white maps and photographs. Penngrove Publications; copyright 1989. Includes 22 bikes trips, with 25 alternate rides, ranging from 5 to 45 miles and totaling over 600 scenic miles. One-third of the rides are on dirt roads for those with mountain bikes. Easy-to-challenging self-guided bike rides, complete with maps, elevation profiles and photographs so you can appreciate the exceptional beauty here.
short_description: Features easy to challenging bicycle rides for touring and mountain bikes in Marin County, California--the heart of bicycling country!
